feed.title: Lychee Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Lychee: Version 5.3.0 - Support for S3 & Copyright per album
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix description empty string creating bug in layout by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2400
  • Add S3 bucket support. by @Kovah in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2379
  • Fix teapot not flagging on phpinfo.php by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2411
  • Fix migration order by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2410
  • Add migration on forgotten license CC-BY-SA by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2416
  • Adjusted with suggested CSS by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2413
  • Adding copyright to albums #1838 by @ThanasisMpalatsoukas in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/1880
  • Version 5.3.0 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2417

New Contributors

  • @ThanasisMpalatsoukas made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/1880
  • @Kovah made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2379

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v5.2.2...v5.3.0

entry.title: New release for Lychee: Version 5.3.1 - Fixes & Speed improvements
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes gen-sizevariants button french translation by @HorlogeSkynet in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2421
  • Fix map not updating in sidebar view. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2423
  • Fix error cover option when selecting photo in smart album by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2430
  • Fix broken thumbnail by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2431
  • Bump spatie/image-optimizer from 1.7.2 to 1.7.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2436
  • Fix order max-min in header to match order in thumbnail by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2435
  • Use random instead of sorted for thumbs of Smart Albumbs by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2429
  • Small improvements to French translation by @anantone in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2442
  • Fix additional_footer_text setting (#2445) by @leso-kn in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2444
  • Composer update + phpstan annotations + Improved speed. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2448
  • version 5.3.1 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2459

New Contributors

  • @anantone made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2442
  • @leso-kn made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2444

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v5.3.0...v5.3.1

entry.title: New release for Lychee: Version 5.4 - Fixes apostrophes in Album names, add login_required option.
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Composer update by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2460
  • Fix #2446: Apostrophes are allowed in names. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2462
  • Add login_required option so access is only after login in. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2461

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v5.3.1...v5.4.0

entry.title: New release for Lychee: Version 5.5
entry.content:
Migrated to Laravel 11. Might have some instability.

What's Changed

  • Fix smart album not having visibilty option by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2470
  • Add some details for clockwork profiler to work by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2465
  • Allow to disable smart albums individually. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2468
  • Fix filename: no more double extension on download. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2474
  • Add ability to create user on the fly on Oauth auth step by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2475
  • Fix timezone warning. (https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2477)
  • Minor speed improvements (https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2478)
  • disable livewire array hack (https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2479)
  • add option to disable login requirements on albums (https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2480)
  • Migrate to Laravel 11 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2464

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v5.4.0...v5.5.0

entry.title: New release for Lychee: Version 5.5.1 - Fix Tag album & fix ffprobe integration to php-exif
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes videos not loading from S3 due to unlisted CSP host by @RickyRomero in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2487
  • Add support for paths in php-exif by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2490
  • Fix error when opening tag album by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2492
  • Simplify by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2493
  • Version 5.5.1 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2494

New Contributors

  • @RickyRomero made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2487

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v5.5.0...v5.5.1
